Vals.com.twofortyfouram.locale.intent.extra.B: ---------Add Time--------- Hour: %SMART_TIME_WAKEUP1 Minute: %SMART_TIME_WAKEUP2 Add Unit: Minutes Add Value: -10 Output Format: HH:mm Output Variable: postpone_time
Vals.net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VA: <StringArray sr=""><_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES0>%postpone_timedate Calculated Date Date resulting from the adding of units (hours, days, etc) properly formatted</_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES0><_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES1>%postpone_timedateisweekday Calculated Date Is Week Day 'true' if the calculated date is on a weekday, 'false' if it's on a weekend.</_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES1><_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES2>%postpone_timedatemillis Milliseconds The number of milliseconds that have elapsed since January 1, 1970 for the calculated date</_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES2><_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES3>%postpone_timedateseconds Seconds The number of seconds that have elapsed since January 1, 1970 for the calculated date</_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES3><_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES4>%err Error Code Only available if you select <b>Continue Task After Error</b> and the action ends in error</_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES4><_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES5>%errmsg Error Message Only available if you select <b>Continue Task After Error</b> and the action ends in error</_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES5></StringArray>
Vals.net.dinglisch.android.tasker.extras.VARI: TimeOutputVariableCalculation DatesToFormatFormat DateHourCalculations DateMinuteCalculations DateFormatCalculations AddUnit AddValue OutputCalculatedDateFormat plugininstanceid plugintypeid

Vals.net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VA: <StringArray sr=""><_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES0>%hue_type Type A fixed name describing the type of light e.g. “Extended color light”.</_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES0><_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES1>%hue_name Name A unique, editable name given to the light.</_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES1><_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES2>%hue_modelid Model Id The hardware model of the light.</_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES2><_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES3>%hue_manufacturername Manufacturer Name The manufacturer name. (as of bridge version 1.7)</_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES3><_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES4>%hue_uniqueid Unique Id The MAC address of the device with a unique endpoint id in the form: AA:BB:CC:DD:EE:FF:00:11-XX (as of bridge version 1.4)</_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES4><_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES5>%hue_swversion Software version An identifier for the software version running on the light.</_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES5><_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES6>%hue_position Position The position (or id) of the light</_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES6><_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES7>%hue_on On On/Off state of the light. On=true, Off=false</_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES7><_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES8>%hue_on_inverted On inverted Inverted On/Off state of the light. On=false, Off=true</_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES8><_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES9>%hue_bri Brightness Brightness of the light. This is a scale from the minimum brightness the light is capable of, 1, to the maximum capable brightness, 254</_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES9><_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES10>%hue_hue Hue Hue of the light. This is a wrapping value between 0 and 65535</_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES10><_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES11>%hue_sat Saturation Saturation of the light. 254 is the most saturated (colored) and 0 is the least saturated (white).</_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES11><_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES12>%hue_effect Effect The dynamic effect of the light, can either be “none” or “colorloop”.</_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES12><_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES13>%hue_xy XY The x and y coordinates of a color in CIE color space.</_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES13><_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES14>%hue_ct CT The Mired Color temperature of the light. 2012 connected lights are capable of 153 (6500K) to 500 (2000K).</_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES14><_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES15>%hue_alert Alert The current alert mode of the light (none|select|lselect)</_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES15><_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES16>%hue_colormode Colormode Indicates the color mode in which the light is working, this is the last command type it received.</_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES16><_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES17>%hue_reachable Reachable Indicates if a light can be reached by the bridge.</_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES17><_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES18>%hue_bridge_id Hue Bridge Id The id of the targeted bridge.</_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES18><_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES19>%hue_bridge_ip Hue Bridge Ip The ip address of the bridge targeted with this action.</_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES19><_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES20>%hue_light_id Light bulb Id The unique id of the light bulb.</_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES20><_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES21>%hue_error Error message Contains an error explanation if something went wrong. (only available when ‘Continue Task After Error’ is set to true)</_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES21></StringArray>
